{{also|Dein|déin}} ==English== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|en|deein}} ===Verb=== {{head|en|verb form}} # {{present participle of|en|de|nocat=1}} ====References==== * {{R:Northumberland 1880}} * {{R:Northeast Dialect 2005}} ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=dein|Dine|Enid|Iden|IndE|Nide|deni|dine|enid|iDEN|nide}} ---- ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Dein}} ''(determiner)'' ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|dīn}}, from {{inh|de|goh|dīn}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*þīnaz}}. Akin to {{cog|osx|thīn}}, {{cog|en|thine}}, {{m|en|thy}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/daɪ̯n/}} * {{audio|de|De-dein.ogg|audio}} * {{rhymes|de|aɪ̯n}} * {{homophones|de|deinen}} {{a|according to a common pronunciation of this form}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|de|pronoun form}} # {{inflection of|de|du||gen|s}} #* '''19th century''', Nikolaus Lenau, ''Schilflieder'', no. 3: #*: Auf geheimem Waldespfade #*: Schleich ich gern im Abendschein #*: An das öde Schilfgestade, #*: Mädchen, und gedenke '''dein'''! #* '''1912''', ''Luther-Bibel 1912'', ''Der Brief des Paulus an Philemon'', verse 4: #*: Ich danke meinem Gott und gedenke '''dein''' allezeit in meinem Gebet[.] ===Determiner=== {{head|de|determiner|cat2=possessive determiners|g=m|feminine|deine|neuter|dein|plural|deine}} # [[thy]], [[your]] {{qualifier|esp. to friends, relatives, children, etc.}}. ====Inflection==== {{de-decl-pronoun|dein|deine|dein|deine|deines|deiner|deines|deiner|deinem|deiner|deinem|deinen|deinen|deine|dein|deine}} When used as a pronoun, the nominative masculine takes the form {{m|de|deiner}}, and the nominative/accusative neuter takes the form {{m|de|deines}} or {{m|de|deins}}. * mein Vater und '''deiner''' – my father and yours * Das ist mein Fahrrad. Das andere ist '''dein'''(e)'''s'''. – This is my bike. The other one is yours. ====See also==== * {{l|de|Ihr|gloss=your}} {{qualifier|addressing formally or politely one or more persons}} ===Determiner=== {{head|de|determiner form}} # {{inflection of|de|dein||nom//acc|n|s}} ---- ==Irish== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|ga|[ˈdʲɪnʲ]}} ===Verb=== {{ga-verb|pres=deineann|fut=déanfaidh|vn=déanamh|pp=déanta|irreg=yes}} # {{alternative form of|ga|déan|from=Munster}} ====Conjugation==== {{ga-conj-dein}} ===Mutation=== {{ga-mut}} ---- ==Latin== ===Pronunciation=== * {{la-IPA|dein}} *: or monosyllabic: * {{la-IPA|de_in}} ===Adverb=== {{la-adv|dein|-}} # {{alternative form of|la|deinde}} ===References=== * {{R:L&S}} * {{R:Elementary Lewis}} ---- ==Manx== ===Verb=== {{head|gv|verb|verbal noun|deiney}} # to [[molest]] ====Mutation==== {{gv mut cons|d|ein}}
